LightningComponentBundle.description: Given a collection of audit history rows, this component will display a table and allow the user to select a row that will be returned as an output.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API name
property.description: The developer name of the object's audit history being viewed

property.name: auditRows
property.label: Audit History List
property.description: A collection of audit entries for accounts

property.name: selectedAuditRow
property.label: Audit Row Chosen
property.description: An audit entry selected by the user

property.name: selectAuditRowObject
property.label: Audit Row Object
property.description: The API name of the object of the audit row chosen
